body.name: Logitech 1080p Pro Stream Webcam for HD Video Streaming and Recording at 1080p 30FPS (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 42 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset. Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: [Cable] Highest standard of quality cables, covered by premium quality braided nylon jacket.Guarantee fast charging and efficient syncing for all compatible devices.

[Portable and safe design] It’s small and lightweight, compact and easily portable, perfect for travelling. It contains internal protection mechanisms, and a hidden blue LED power indicator to let you know when your phone is charging.
[2-Port USB ] Our 2 USB ports have 24W/4.8a power and allows you to charge two devices simultaneously, at top speed!
[Compatibility] Compatible with Phone X/8/7/7 Plus, Phone 6S/6S Plus, Phone 6/6 Plus, Phone 5/5S/5C/se, Pad Pro, Pad Air 1/2, pad Mini 1/2/3, Pod Nano7, Pod Touch and more Apple devices.
[What you get] 1 x 2-port USB wall charger, 1 x 6ft Graywhite nylon braided Lightning cable, 1 x Year Limited warranty. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No issues at all. Great quality and price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a genuine Logitech webcam, just has the factory sticker removed
reviews.reviewText: I'd consider this purchase to be of excellent value, considering that a brand new webcam of the same model goes for almost double the current sale price.Keep in mind, this is essentially "certified pre-owned", so expect to receive a unit with minor scratches and blemishes sans original packaging. Only odd thing is that the factory sticker on the back of the camera, with the model/serial number, was removed. Doesn't affect the functionality at all, though, as this webcam works perfectly otherwise. Shows up in Device Manager as a genuine Logitech webcam of the expected model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No Linux Support
reviews.reviewText: Camera works fine on Linux, with the exception that Logitech does not have control software that runs on Linux, making the zoom and other features useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Camera itself works great. So for only issue I have is not related to the seller or the product but with Logitech's software itself. Right now just using one of the generic programs to at least use the camera, but certain extra features or advanced settings I haven't really been able to touch due to issues with downloading certain suites from Logitech.The packaging was more than adequate and it arrived promptly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to have
reviews.reviewText: Works like a charm and very happy with my purchase. The mic is amazing too and picture came in clear as soon as I plugged it into my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kind of "off brand" branded but great cam
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great. It doesn't really have an advertised model number or anything, but it is Logitech, so that got my purchase. It worked out well, easily connected and I have been happy with it since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This isn't much better than my cheap camera
reviews.reviewText: The image quality is about the same as my cheap knock off camera I bought years ago. Bought the Logitech because I was told it would be higher quality. Seems about the same so far. Time will tell, but it's heavy and seems well built.As others noted, there's no sticker or official labelling on the camera. Makes me concerned it's a 'copy' and not a real Logitech camera. However looks and functions just like my sons which was full priced and official.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t skimp on a cheap branded cam...
reviews.reviewText: Tried two different model cheap webcam brands before this one.... they worked, but it was impossible to get the right lighting conditions for them to have proper exposure.This camera auto focuses and auto exposes light conditions to provide optimum clarity to the subject.Don’t waste your time, like I did, buying cheap options... spend a few more dollars and get a product that works perfect for web streaming right out of the box.
